text: All the fat also he shall take off, as the fat of the ram that is offered for peace offerings is one to be taken away and shall burn it upon the altar for a burnt sacrifice of the Lord, and he shall pray for him and his sin, and it shall be forgiven him.

segments.text: All the fat also he shall take off, as the fat of the ram that is offered for peace
offerings is one to be taken away and shall burn it upon the altar for a burnt sacrifice
of the Lord, and he shall pray for him and his sin, and it shall be forgiven him.
